articles.title: A hidden Picasso painting from the early Blue Period is revealed by new technology - WUFT
articles.description: Experts analyzing the painting have several theories about why this unidentified woman has remained submerged for more than a century.
articles.content: One of the earliest pieces from Pablo Picasso's iconic Blue Period has revealed an unexpected discovery: another figure beneath the surface. This finding provides further insight into the process of … [+1578 chars]
